message: Ran into this, while trying to use my writable storage
Alright, should be fixed - things were being written onto the wrong disk on the server, we'd missed a mountpoint
Looks like we had a mounting issue there, I'll fix it
@rasiel The Ubuntu package of PIL (which we're using) is built with JPEG support, so it should be fine - want to send me a failing file at andrew@ep.io so I can test?

@andrewgodwin confirmed that its working now, a quick question is there a jpg encoder installed? I know you have PIL, but i don't think it binds it build initially with an encoder right? ... I ask because my jpg uploads couldn't be resized, while my pngs work fine
@andrewgodwin sent you an email with a test image
